entries.content: Learn to identify time-wasters versus serious potential investors or partners by assessing the vibe and nature of conversations.
entries.notes: Relates to diagnosing the level of genuine interest or intent.

entries.content: Maintain professionalism and keep business interactions short and sweet when dealing with individuals from your personal life, focusing only on the transaction.
entries.notes: Applies when the personal connection is 'not interested' or undesirable, but the business opportunity is valid.

focus_area: Handling "Not Interested": Probe softly, diagnose if disinterest or timing
